function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contagious coronaviruses in aerosols","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus to individuals in the built environment","Mitigation":"Utilize far-UVC light to inactivate the coronaviruses in the aerosols","Technologies":"Far-UVC light for viral inactivation","People":"People in the built environment","Owner":"Health and safety professionals, building managers"},{"Description":"Risk of viral integration in human lung host cells","Impact":"Potential integration of the virus in human lung cells","Mitigation":"Utilize far-UVC light to prevent viral integration in human lung host cells","Technologies":"Far-UVC light for viral inactivation","People":"People in the built environment","Owner":"Health and safety professionals, building managers"}]}
